Laning_Combo_Desc: When the opponent is focused on clearing Minions, poke them with Sora's 1st Skill, then use his 2nd Skill to create distance. Use the mobility from his 1st and 2nd Skill to effectively kite enemies. Sora's damage is reliant on hitting with his 1st Skill.
Teamfight_Combo_Desc: In mid-to-late game teamfights, Sora is able to adapt to different situations. He can ascend to Thunder form to dive the enemy backline, or Torrent form to become a CC machine and take control of the battlefield.

Laning_Combo_Desc: During the laning phase, use Obsidia's 1st Skill often on enemy Minions and heroes to quickly stack her Passive. When the enemy's HP drops low enough, use Obsidia's 2nd Skill and Ultimate on them and finish them off with Basic Attacks.
Teamfight_Combo_Desc: During teamfights, use Obsidia's Basic Attacks and 1st Skill to poke the enemy, and her 2nd Skill to reposition herself. Look for opportunities to close in on a target with her Ultimate and pick them off with your team. Finally, use her mobility and powerful Basic Attacks to clean up the remaining enemies.

Laning_Combo_Desc: In the laning phase, Use Zetian's 2nd Skill to slow the enemy and reduce their Magic Defense, then use her 1st Skill while moving to reposition and deal sustained damage. If enemies leave the area of the 2nd Skill, use it again to move the Phoenix on top of them.
Teamfight_Combo_Desc: In teamfights, use Zetian's Ultimate to boost her team's Movement Speed and launch the global attack, then immediately use her 2nd Skill to slow enemies, making it easier for the Ultimate to land. Follow-up with her 1st Skill for more AoE, and recast the 2nd Skill if enemies try to leave its range.

Laning_Combo_Desc: While ganking with Kalea, use her 2nd Skill to close in and CC the target, then use her 1st Skill to activate her enhanced Basic Attacks and unleash them on the target.
Teamfight_Combo_Desc: In teamfights, Kalea should prioritize enemy Mages or Marksmen. Use the first part of her 2nd Skill to dash into an obstacle near the target, then dive down to CC them, and follow up with her Ultimate to slam them into your team. Use her 1st Skill to trigger her Passive, and unload her enhanced Basic Attacks on the target.

Laning_Combo_Desc: Lukas should use his 2nd Skill to close in on the enemy, then use the enhanced Basic Attack plus another Basic Attack to get 2 stacks of Vigor. Now use his fully powered 1st Skill to inflict high damage and stun and displace the target, then back off to avoid the enemy's counterattack.
Teamfight_Combo_Desc: In Sacred Beast form, use Lukas's 2nd Skill followed by an enhanced Basic Attack, then another Basic Attack to get 2 stacks of Vigor. Use his 1st Skill to inflict high damage and CC, and finish off with Shockwave Blast to devastate the enemy with a massive AOE attack.

Laning_Combo_Desc: Hold-casting Skill 1 in the Bush allows Suyou to attack unexpectedly and control the enemy; then hold-cast Skill 2 to deal massive damage and follow up the Basic Attack by tap-casting Skill 3 to leave the battlefield.
Teamfight_Combo_Desc: Hold-cast Skill 3 to poke before the team fight, then hold-cast Skill 1 to engage and control the enemy at their back, then hold-cast Skill 2 to deal massive damage. Then tap-cast Skill 3 to keep your distance from the enemy, and when the skill cooldown is up, tap-cast Skill 1 and Skill 2 to quickly kill the target.

Laning_Combo_Desc: In the laning phase, use Zhuxin's 1st Skill to slow the opponent and increase her own Movement Speed, then use her 2nd Skill from a safe position and try to hit the Minions and the opponent at the same time to both poke and clear the lane. Once the enemy has enough stacks, throw them into the Minions for additional damage.
Teamfight_Combo_Desc: In teamfights, use Zhuxin's Ultimate to blink into a good position, then follow up with her 1st Skill to slow the enemy team and use her 2nd Skill to build stacks at a safe distance. Try to capture as many enemies as possible with her 2nd Skill, then throw them out of position while also grouping them up.

Laning_Combo_Desc: When ganking, use Chip's 2nd Skill to quickly get behind the target and knock them into your team with the enhanced Basic Attack, then follow up with his 1st Skill and another Basic Attack to stun them.
Teamfight_Combo_Desc: In teamfights, use Chip's 2nd Skill preemptively to build up speed, then hit a target with his Basic Attack and deploy the Main Portal with his Ultimate. Follow up with his 1st Skill on the enemy and another Basic Attack to stun them while the Main Portal's delayed effect slows them, and continue the fight as allies portal in.

Laning_Combo_Desc: In the laning phase, use Cici's Basic Attacks to stack some Delight before using her 1st Skill on the opponent, and use her 2nd Skill if they attempt an escape.
Teamfight_Combo_Desc: In teamfights, find two enemy heroes that are close together and toss Cici's Ultimate on one of them, then use her 2nd Skill to jump in and pop her 1st Skill mid-leap to start dealing continuous damage.

Laning_Combo_Desc: In the laning phase, use Nolan's 2nd Skill and enhanced Basic Attack to catch the enemy, then use his 1st Skill to activate the rift. Follow up with his 2nd Skill into his 1st Skill to activate another rift explosion.
Teamfight_Combo_Desc: In teamfights, approach the enemy using Nolan's 2nd Skill and enhanced Basic Attack, then activate the rift with his 1st Skill. Use Nolan's 2nd Skill to dash through the enemy, and unleash his Ultimate to activate all the rifts while dashing back to safety.

Laning_Combo_Desc: Ixia can pull enemies to the center line with her 2nd Skill and follow up with her 1st Skill to deal damage. Use the Movement Speed boost provided by her 1st Skill to chase down enemies.
Teamfight_Combo_Desc: Choose the perfect location that can secure herself and cast the Ultimate to rain down her attacks on as many enemies as possible. Keep tapping Basic Attack while using her 2nd Skill and 1st Skill to control enemies and deal extra damage.

Laning_Combo_Desc: In the laning phase, after Arlott's Passive marks an enemy hero, use his 2nd Skill to dash through them and get a cooldown reset. Follow up with his 1st Skill to CC the enemy and mark them again, then hit them with his 2nd Skill while resetting its cooldown.
Teamfight_Combo_Desc: In teamfights, start by hitting a marked enemy hero with Arlott's 2nd Skill, then get into position to unleash his Ultimate on the enemy team to CC and mark them. Use Arlott's 2nd Skill to cut through the enemy from target to target. When all marks have been used up, use his 1st Skill to CC and mark enemies again, and continue to chain his 2nd Skill.

Laning_Combo_Desc: In the laning phase, initiate by using Novaria's 2nd Skill to gain extra Movement Speed and summon an Astral Sphere. Then, slow the enemy with her 1st Skill and use her 2nd Skill again to launch the Astral Sphere to deal damage.
Teamfight_Combo_Desc: In teamfights, use Novaria's Ultimate to gain vision of the battlefield, then summon an Astral Sphere with her 2nd Skill. After catching the Astral Sphere, launch it to damage the enemy and use her 1st Skill to thwart enemy heroes that try to get close.

Laning_Combo_Desc: In the laning phase, Joy should place her 1st Skill on top of the enemy, then use her 2nd Skill to dash through both targets and continue to chain her 2nd Skill on the beat for damage.
Teamfight_Combo_Desc: In teamfights, Joy should summon a Leonin Crystal with her 1st Skill and use it as a springboard for her 2nd Skill to enter the battle. Continue to chain her 2nd Skill on the beat to unlock her Ultimate. Finally, use her Ultimate to finish off the enemy.

Laning_Combo_Desc: In the laning phase, Fredrinn can dash to the enemy hero with his 2nd Skill, and knock that hero airborne with the enhanced Basic Attack. Then follow up with his 1st Skill to deal damage.
Teamfight_Combo_Desc: In teamfights, Fredrinn should use his 2nd Skill to close in on the enemy hero and knock them airborne, then use his 1st Skill and 1st Ultimate for CC and cooldown reset. Use his enhanced Basic Attacks, 1st and 2nd skills sequentially to deal heavy damage, and finish with his 2nd Ultimate after knocking the enemy airborne for the kill.

Laning_Combo_Desc: In the laning phase, Julian can use his 2nd Skill to close in on the enemy, and his 3rd Skill to immobilize them. Then he can use his enhanced 1st Skill to deal damage. Follow up with his enhanced Basic Attacks to prevent the enemy from escaping.
Teamfight_Combo_Desc: In teamfights, Julian can slow the enemy with his 1st Skill before dashing into the enemy battle formation with his 2nd Skill. Then use his enhanced 3rd Skill for area CC.

Laning_Combo_Desc: In the laning phase, Xavier possesses great poke with his 1st Skill and can utilize the slow from his 2nd Skill to make targets easier to hit. This combination allows him to quickly reach Transcendence. When the opportunity arises, use his Ultimate to finish off an enemy and while in Transcendence state.
Teamfight_Combo_Desc: Cast Xavier's Ultimate to enter or refresh Transcendence, then try to hit as many enemies as possible with his 2nd Skill, and follow up with his 1st Skill to create a forbidden field to immobilize enemies. Continue casting his 1st Skill to extend Transcendence's duration while going for kills.

Laning_Combo_Desc:
Link the enemy with her 2nd Skill and use
Basic Attacks to deal extra damage. 
Chase enemies trying to flee with her 1st Skill.
Teamfight_Combo_Desc:
Link enemies with her 2nd Skill for increased damage.
Use 1st Skill to keep them linked and her Ultimate
to stop enemies from getting close.

Laning_Combo_Desc: In the laning phase, Yin should use his 1st Skill to gain Movement Speed, then use his 2nd Skill to dash behind the enemy so the Golden Rings will stun them on their return, and end with his enhanced Basic Attack.
Teamfight_Combo_Desc: Yin should use his 1st Skill to gain Movement Speed and then his 2nd Skill to get close to a key enemy and hit them with his enhanced Basic Attack before trapping them in his Ultimate. In Lieh form, use his 2nd Skill to stun the enemy and finish them off with his 1st Skill.

Laning_Combo_Desc: In the laning phase, use Floryn's 2nd Skill to stun enemies, then follow up with her 1st Skill for damage and healing.
Teamfight_Combo_Desc: In teamfights, use Floryn's 2nd Skill to CC enemies, and her 1st Skill for damage and healing. When a teammate is in bad shape, use Floryn's Ultimate to save them.

Laning_Combo_Desc:
In the laning phase, use Edith's 2nd Skill to toss the enemy behind her,
then use her 1st Skill to knock them airborne
and finish them off with enhanced Basic Attacks from her Passive.
Teamfight_Combo_Desc:
In teamfights, use Edith's 2nd Skill to toss the enemy behind her, followed by her 1st Skill to knock them airborne then immediately use her Ultimate.
Now use Edith's 2nd Skill in human form to immobilize the target, followed by her 1st Skill for more damage, and secure the kill with enhanced Basic Attacks.

Laning_Combo_Desc: Use 1st Skill to poke, then 2nd Skill to refresh its CD, and 1st Skill on the same enemy again to cause Terrify.
Teamfight_Combo_Desc: Copy an Ultimate or use 2nd Skill for better positioning. Use 1st Skill and reset its cooldown with 2nd Skill, then Terrify the target and use her copied Ultimate to secure the kill.

Laning_Combo_Desc: Use his skills and Enhanced Basic Attacks for very high jungling efficiency.
Teamfight_Combo_Desc: Use 2nd Skill to Camouflage and flank the enemy. Deal damage with his 1st Skill and Basic Attacks, and Ultimate to take out backline heroes.

Laning_Combo_Desc:
In the laning phase, wear down enemies with 2nd Skill
and use his enhanced Basic Attacks to quickly build passive stacks. When the time is right, close the distance with his 1st Skill and follow up with his 2nd Skill, then finish the enemy with Basic Attacks.
Teamfight_Combo_Desc:
In teamfights, use his 1st Skill to charge into the midst of the enemy team and use his Ultimate to hit as many targets as possible. Follow up with his 2nd Skill,
before unleashing a flurry of Basic Attacks for considerable damage.

Laning_Combo_Desc: In the laning phase, use Natan's 1st Skill and Basic Attacks to chip away at the enemy. When their HP is low enough, use his 2nd Skill to knockback the enemy and finish them off with Basic Attacks.
Teamfight_Combo_Desc: In teamfights, summon a Reverse-Clone with Natan's Ultimate, then use his 2nd Skill followed by his 1st Skill to knockback and damage enemies, and finish with a barrage of Basic Attacks. Depending on the situation, Natan's Ultimate can also be used to chase or escape.

Laning_Combo_Desc: In the laning phase, Phoveus should first use his enhanced Basic Attack to hit the enemy hero and gain a shield. Follow up with his 1st Skill to chip away their HP, then use his enhanced 1st Skill for additional damage and to slow the target, and end with his 2nd Skill for more damage.
Teamfight_Combo_Desc: In teamfights, Phoveus should use his enhanced Basic Attack to charge at the enemy while knocking them back and marking them. Then immediately follow up with his Ultimate. Next, hit the target with his 1st Skill, then use his 2nd skill and his Ultimate again. Finally, use the enhanced 1st Skill to mark the enemy once more, and use his Ultimate.

Laning_Combo_Desc: In the laning phase, we recommend using Renner as Beatrix's primary weapon and Wesker as her secondary weapon. She can use Renner's ranged Basic Attack to poke the enemy, and her 2nd Skill to reload and fire again. She can then switch to Wesker to finish off the target enemy.
Teamfight_Combo_Desc: For teamfights, we recommend using Bennett as Beatrix's primary weapon and Nibiru as her secondary weapon. During a teamfight, Beatrix can use Bennett's Ultimate to strike the enemy team. Then she can use her 1st Skill to switch to Nibiru, and cast Nibiru's Ultimate to attack the enemy. She can finish off the enemy heroes with her Basic Attacks and her 2nd Skill.

Laning_Combo_Desc: In the laning phase, Gloo should use his 1st Skill to attack the target enemy and create a Goo, then he can use his 2nd Skill to target the Goo to bring the target to its location and trigger an explosion. Touching the Goo will also reset Gloo's 1st Skill, allowing him to use it again to deal damage.
Teamfight_Combo_Desc: In teamfights, Gloo can use his 1st + 2nd skill combo to close in on the enemy and immobilize them. Then his 1st Skill and Ultimate to add more Sticky stacks to enemy heroes, and attach himself with his Ultimate to the enemy hero with max Sticky stacks. Once ready, Gloo can use the combo to deal damage and move the host out of position. Finally, he can use the refreshed 1st Skill and his Basic Attacks to finish off the host.

Laning_Combo_Desc: In the laning phase, Paquito can use his 1st Skill to gain a stack for the Champ Stance before using his 2nd Skill to close in on the enemy hero. He can use his 1st Skill again to deal damage and enter the Champ Stance. He should then hit the enemy hero with the enhanced 2nd Skill.
Teamfight_Combo_Desc: In teamfights, Paquito can use his 2nd Skill to approach the enemy team, then his 1st Skill to deal damage. He should follow up with his Ultimate to knock the enemy back and enter the Champ Stance. He can finish with his enhanced 2nd Skill to deal heavy damage to the enemies.

Laning_Combo_Desc:
In the laning phase, use Mathilda's 1st Skill in advance and keep moving to gather wisps, then use her 2nd Skill to get close to the enemy
and unleash all her wisps at the target before ending with an enhanced Basic Attack. Use her Ultimate to secure the kill if the enemy is low on HP.
Teamfight_Combo_Desc:
In teamfights, first activate Mathilda's 1st skill,
then immediately use her 2nd Skill to get to a good position to initiate from
and unleash her Ultimate on the primary target. This combo allows Mathilda to quickly CC a key enemy hero, and lets an ally follow up by using Guiding Wind from her 2nd Skill.

Laning_Combo_Desc: In the laning phase, use Yve's 2nd Skill to first slow the enemy from afar, then hit them with the center of her 1st Skill.
Teamfight_Combo_Desc: In teamfights, use Yve's Ultimate to cover as many enemies as possible and unleash multiple attacks on them. When the enemies run out of Yve's Ultimate, cancel it and use her 2nd Skill to slow them, then finish them off with her 1st Skill.

Laning_Combo_Desc: Brody can regularly use his 1st Skill and Basic Attacks to clear lanes and poke the enemy heroes. Once enemy heroes are low on HP, Brody can use his 2nd Skill to close in and stun them, then cast his Ultimate to try to finish them off.
Teamfight_Combo_Desc: Brody should prioritize using his 1st Skill and Basic Attack, to apply Abyss Marks on enemy heroes outside of the battle area. He can then use his Ultimate and Basic Attack to deal heavy damage and his 2nd Skill and Basic Attack to chase down enemies on the run.

Laning_Combo_Desc: In the laning phase, spam Barats' low Mana cost 1st Skill to build Big Guy stacks while slowing and poking the enemy. Use his 2nd Skill to push the enemy to him and hit them with Basic Attacks.
Teamfight_Combo_Desc: In teamfights, use Barats' 1st Skill to maintain Big Guy stacks. Approach the enemy and use his 2nd Skill to push them close before using his Ultimate to minimize their chance of escape, then finish them off with Basic Attacks.

Laning_Combo_Desc: In the laning phase, move around to fill up Khaleed's Desert Power first, then hit the opponent with the enhanced Basic Attack to slow them and follow up with 3 hits from his 1st Skill. This should fill up his Desert Power again, allowing for another enhanced Basic Attack.
Teamfight_Combo_Desc: In teamfights, use Khaleed's Ultimate to initiate, then hit a target with his enhanced Basic Attack and continue the attack with his 1st Skill. Once Desert Power is full again, use another Basic Attack. Then use Khaleed's 2nd Skill to recover HP and reduce incoming damage.

Laning_Combo_Desc: In the laning phase, gather Sword Intent by holding Benedetta's Basic Attack button, then use Swordout Slash after Sword Intent is maxed to strike the enemy. Follow up with her 1st Skill and try to max out Sword Intent again by blocking the enemy's attack with her 2nd Skill, then end the combo with another Swordout Slash.
Teamfight_Combo_Desc: In teamfights, use Swordout Slash to get close to the enemy, then use Benedetta's Ultimate where the enemy is clustered, and follow up with her 1st Skill for additional damage and 2nd Skill to block incoming CC.

Laning_Combo_Desc: In the laning phase, use Luo Yi's 1st Skill to mark the enemy with a Yin/Yang Sigil, then use her 2nd Skill to summon Fire of Yang or Aqua of Yin in range of the target to trigger a Yin-Yang Reaction.
Teamfight_Combo_Desc: In teamfights, use Luo Yi's 1st Skill to mark the enemy with a Yin/Yang Sigil and use it again on another nearby enemy to apply the opposite Sigil and trigger a Yin-Yang Reaction. Then repeat the process. If there is only one enemy, use Luo Yi's 2nd Skill to trigger Yin-Yang Reactions.

Laning_Combo_Desc: In the laning phase, use Yu Zhong's 2nd Skill to slow the enemy and leap on them using his 3rd Skill. When repositioning with the dash of his 3rd Skill, cast his 1st Skill to hit the enemy with the outer edge, and follow up with the enhanced Basic Attack from his 2nd Skill and finish the combo with a Sha Residue eruption.
Teamfight_Combo_Desc: In teamfights, open with Yu Zhong's Ultimate and run into the enemy's formation while knocking them around. When the enemy's backline heroes are exposed, use his Ultimate again to enter Dragonoid Form, and unleash his combo starting with his 2nd Skill then 3rd Skill, then 1st Skill to deal tons of damage. Finally, use the enhanced Basic Attack from his 2nd Skill to finish off the enemy.

Laning_Combo_Desc:
In the laning phase, poke enemies with the 1st Skill
and get more Attack Speed with their Ultimate when enemies are low on HP. Then control and kill the enemies with the enhanced 1st Skill.
Teamfight_Combo_Desc:
In teamfights, boost Attack Speed with their Ultimate
and control enemies with the enhanced 1st Skill for heavy damage. When enemies are close, use the enhanced 2nd Skill for protection.

Laning_Combo_Desc: In the laning phase, use Atlas's 2nd Skill to eject and then get close to the enemy. Right before the Mecha Sentry reaches Atlas, use his 1st Skill to double the effect.
Teamfight_Combo_Desc: In teamfights, use Atlas's 2nd Skill to approach the enemy and unleash his Ultimate when multiple enemies are in range. Aim while channeling and release to slam them down near your team, then continue to deal damage with his 1st Skill.

Laning_Combo_Desc: In the laning phase, use Carmilla's 2nd Skill to get close to the opponent, then use her 1st Skill and stick to them to deal continuous damage.
Teamfight_Combo_Desc: In teamfights, use Carmilla's Ultimate to engage and slow enemies, then use her 2nd Skill to get close and CC a target, and follow up with her 1st Skill for continuous AOE damage.

Laning_Combo_Desc: In the laning phase, use Cecilion's 2nd Skill to pull enemies together, then repeatedly hit them with his 1st Skill.
Teamfight_Combo_Desc: In teamfights, initiate with Cecilion's Ultimate to slow the enemy, then hit them with his 1st Skill. When the time is right, pull the enemies together using his 2nd Skill and spam his 1st Skill for damage.

Laning_Combo_Desc:
Silvanna can poke enemies with her [2nd Skill]
and use her 1st Skill to close the distance once they're low on HP.
Then, she can control them and finish them off with her [ULTIMATE].
Teamfight_Combo_Desc:
In teamfights,
Silvanna can control back-row enemies with her [ULTIMATE]
and then stun them with her [1st Skill].
Finally, she can deal damage with her [2nd Skill] and Basic Attacks.

Laning_Combo_Desc:
In the laning phase, Wanwan can poke enemies with her 1st Skill
and then use Basic Attacks to dash with her Passive and adjust Swallow Daggers' paths to control enemies. After hitting an enemy's three Weaknesses, she can finish them off with her Ultimate.
Teamfight_Combo_Desc: In teamfights, use Basic Attacks to dash with her Passive and adjust position for damage, and then land as many hits as possible with her 1st Skill. After hitting all Weaknesses, reap kills with her Ultimate.

Laning_Combo_Desc: In the laning phase, use Masha's 1st Skill to close the gap with the enemy and slow them with her 2nd Skill to engage. Follow up with Basic Attacks for more damage.
Teamfight_Combo_Desc: In teamfights, charge into an enemy with Masha's Ultimate, then use her 1st Skill followed by Basic Attacks to deal more damage. Whenever she loses an HP bar, use her Ultimate again to charge at the target and slow them with her 2nd Skill.

Laning_Combo_Desc: In the laning phase, roll into the enemy with Baxia's 1st Skill and follow up with his 2nd Skill and Basic Attacks.
Teamfight_Combo_Desc: In teamfights, first activate Baxia's 1st Skill, then use his Ultimate to speed up. After running into an enemy, use his 2nd Skill followed by Basic Attacks to deal damage.

Laning_Combo_Desc: Use Lylia's 2nd Skill to hit the opponent, then use her 1st Skill to detonate the Shadow Energy for a significant burst of damage. Continue to throw her 2nd Skill at the enemy and detonate it with Gloom.
Teamfight_Combo_Desc: Use Lylia's 2nd Skill multiple times to cover a large area with Shadow Energy, then detonate a chain reaction with her 1st Skill. Continue to spam Lylia's 2nd Skill and detonate with Gloom to quickly set off multiple explosions at once. When in danger, use Lylia's Ultimate to return to safety and recover.

Laning_Combo_Desc: In the laning phase, Dyrroth can use his 2nd Skill to close in on the enemy and cast it again to lower their Physical Defense. He can then follow up with his Basic Attacks and 1st Skill to poke them.
Teamfight_Combo_Desc: In teamfights, Dyrroth should use his 2nd Skill to close the gap with the enemy, then use his Basic Attacks and 1st Skill to deal damage, and finish off the low HP heroes with his Ultimate.

Laning_Combo_Desc: In the laning phase, Ling should use his 1st Skill to leap onto the wall, and strike down with his 2nd Skill to deal damage to the target enemy and slow them. Follow up with Ling's Basic Attacks and his 2nd Skill to chase down the enemy hero.
Teamfight_Combo_Desc: In teamfights, Ling should move onto the wall with his 1st Skill, then use his 2nd Skill to land on enemy back-row heroes. Once landed, Ling should attack the target heroes with his Basic Attacks, and then cast his Ultimate to avoid incoming damage. He should then follow his targets when in the air to deal damage and knock them airborne. He can then dash with his 2nd Skill between the Tempest Blades to reset its cooldown and restore Lightness Points.

Laning_Combo_Desc: In the laning phase, cast X.Borg's 1st Skill then use his 2nd Skill to pull enemies toward him.
Teamfight_Combo_Desc: In teamfights, cast X.Borg's 1st Skill, then activate his Ultimate when enemies are clustered, and uses his 2nd Skill to pull them back to him.

Laning_Combo_Desc: In the laning phase, Terizla can use his 1st Skill to slow the enemy, then his 2nd Skill to repeatedly deal damage to them.
Teamfight_Combo_Desc: In teamfights, Terizla can open with his Ultimate and his 1st Skill to control the enemy team, then use his 2nd Skill to repeatedly hit the targets pulled by the Scaffold.

Laning_Combo_Desc: In the laning phase, use Esmeralda's 1st Skill to approach the enemy and hit them with her 2nd Skill followed by Basic Attacks. Her 1st Skill should be up again soon thanks to the CD reduction from her 2nd Skill, so use her 1st Skill again for Movement Speed and shields, and continue using her 2nd Skill and Basic Attacks.
Teamfight_Combo_Desc: In teamfights, enter the fight using Esmeralda's Ultimate, then use her 1st Skill to gain Movement Speed and steal the shields of nearby enemies, before finishing them off with her 2nd Skill and Basic Attacks.

Laning_Combo_Desc: In the laning phase, Guinevere should use her 1st Skill and her enhanced Basic Attacks to clear out the Minions and poke enemy heroes. When enemy heroes' HP is low, user Guinevere's 2nd Skill to close in on them and knock them airborne. Follow up with her Ultimate to try to finish them off.
Teamfight_Combo_Desc: In teamfights, Guinevere can use her 2nd Skill to knock the enemy team airborne and follow with her Ultimate to deal damage while keeping them airborne. She can then use the dash of her 2nd Skill to dodge the incoming damage, or she can choose to use her 1st Skill to deal more damage for a full damage combo.

Laning_Combo_Desc: In the laning phase, use Granger's 1st Skill to poke the enemy. When his energy gets low, use his 2nd Skill to replenish it and continue to poke with his 1st Skill.
Teamfight_Combo_Desc: In teamfights, use Granger's Ultimate to poke from a safe distance and continue the attack with his 1st Skill. When the 1st Skill ends, use his Ultimate again for more damage and to reposition. If enemies get close, use his 2nd Skill to create distance and continue dealing damage with his 1st Skill.

Laning_Combo_Desc: In the laning phase, Khufra uses his 1st Skill to aim while charging before launching himself to CC the enemy target. He then deals damage and slows the target with his enhanced Basic Attack and follows up with his 2nd Skill to keep the target slowed.
Teamfight_Combo_Desc: In teamfights, Khufra should open with his 1st Skill, then his Ultimate for area control, follow up with his 2nd Skill to prevent the enemy from escaping with their dash or blink skills.

Laning_Combo_Desc: In the laning phase, use Badang's 1st Skill to whittle down the enemy's HP. Use his 2nd Skill to trap the enemy, then use his 1st Skill to knock them into the barrier to stun them, and finish with Basic Attacks.
Teamfight_Combo_Desc: In teamfights, use Badang's 2nd Skill when the enemy is grouped up to trap multiple targets in the barrier, and unleash his Ultimate to repeatedly knock them into it for massive damage. Then use his 1st Skill and Basic Attacks to continue the onslaught.

Laning_Combo_Desc:
In the laning phase, use Faramis' 1st Skill to get close to the enemy
and hit them with his 2nd Skill while applying a Nether Mark with the 1st Skill. Then, use his 1st Skill again to pull the enemy back to him.
Teamfight_Combo_Desc: In teamfights, use Faramis' Ultimate to protect his allies, then get close to the enemy and apply Nether Marks with his 1st Skill. Activate the 1st Skill again to pull them over and follow up with his 2nd Skill for additional damage.

Laning_Combo_Desc: In the laning phase, use Kadita's 1st Skill to constantly harass enemies, and look for opportunities to use her 2nd Skill.
Teamfight_Combo_Desc: In teamfights, target the enemy's backline with Kadita's 1st Skill, and use her 2nd Skill when passing through enemies to knock them airborne. Follow up with her Ultimate for massive damage and avoid all incoming damage while being untargetable.

Laning_Combo_Desc: In the laning phase, Minsitthar should use his 1st Skill to pull the enemy to him and slow them with his 2nd Skill, before unleashing his enhanced Basic Attacks.
Teamfight_Combo_Desc: In teamfights, Minsitthar should use his 1st Skill to pull in multiple enemies before using his Ultimate to restrict their movement, and then use his 2nd Skill's enhanced Basic Attacks to deal AOE damage.

Laning_Combo_Desc: In the laning phase, approach the enemy with Harith's 2nd Skill, hit them with an enhanced Basic Attack, then use his 1st Skill to chip away their HP.
Teamfight_Combo_Desc:
In teamfights, first use Harith's 2nd Skill to get close to the enemy,
then follow up with the Ultimate, and start spamming his 1st and 2nd Skill.
Dashing through the Ultimate not only reduces his skill cooldowns, but also allows Harith to get multiple enhanced Basic Attacks from his 2nd Skill.

Laning_Combo_Desc: In the laning phase, use Thamuz's 1st Skill, then leap to enemy using his 2nd Skill, causing his Scythes to return and resetting the CD of his 1st Skill. Follow up with a Basic Attack and then his 1st Skill, and tap the skill again to retrieve the Scythes and end with Basic Attacks.
Teamfight_Combo_Desc: In teamfights, use Thamuz's 1st Skill to speed up and adjust positioning, then jump into the crowd using his 2nd Skill. Activate his Ultimate followed by a Basic Attack and his 1st Skill, and retrieve the Scythes before continuing with Basic Attacks.

Laning_Combo_Desc: In the laning phase, Build up Starlium before engaging. Use her 1st Skill to quickly close in on the opponent, then use her 2nd Skill to immobilize them before unleashing her enhanced Basic Attacks for great damage.
Teamfight_Combo_Desc: In teamfights, Kimmy can initiate with her Ultimate to group up enemies, then follow up with her 2nd Skill to immobilize them, and finish with her enhanced Basic Attacks for lots of damage. If enemies try to counter by closing in on Kimmy, use her 1st Skill to retreat.

Laning_Combo_Desc: In the laning phase, use Belerick's 2nd Skill to close the distance with the opponent and slow them with his enhanced Basic Attack, then follow up with his 1st Skill to CC them.
Teamfight_Combo_Desc: In teamfights, charge into the enemy formation with Belerick's 2nd Skill and taunt as many targets as possible with his Ultimate, then follow up with his 1st Skill to keep them taunted.

Laning_Combo_Desc: When ganking, Hanzo can use his 2nd Skill to close the distance, then stack his Passive with Basic Attacks and unleash his 1st Skill at max stacks for hefty damage. In teamfights, Hanzo should activate his Ultimate from a safe position and engage as Hanekage. Use his 2nd Skill to dash in and knock enemies Airborne, then use his Black Mist and Basic Attacks to quickly stack his Passive and use his 1st Skill for maximum damage.
Teamfight_Combo_Desc: Hanzo should activate his Ultimate from a safe position and engage as Hanekage. Use his 2nd Skill to dash in and knock enemies Airborne, then use his Black Mist and Basic Attacks to quickly stack his Passive and use his 1st Skill for maximum damage.

Laning_Combo_Desc: In the laning phase, use Lunox's 3rd Skill to slow the opponent and her 2nd Skill to poke. When she takes damage, use her 1st Skill to heal back up.
Teamfight_Combo_Desc: In teamfights, use Lunox's 3rd Skill to slow enemies first and follow up with her 2nd Skill to gain the Power of Chaos, then activate her Darkening Ultimate and spam her 2nd Skill for a lot of damage. Afterwards, use her 1st Skill to gain the Power of Order, then activate her Brilliance Ultimate to become invincible and deal damage to nearby enemies.

Laning_Combo_Desc:
Poke and zone out enemies with his 1st Skill while clearing minions.
When the enemy's HP is close to his Passive's threshold,
charge in with his 2nd Skill and finish them off with Basic Attacks.
Teamfight_Combo_Desc: In teamfights, Leomord can cast his Ultimate, then his 1st and 2nd Skills while Barbiel is moving towards him. After mounting, Leomord can use his mounted 1st Skill, 2nd Skill, and Basic Attacks to continue dishing out damage.

Laning_Combo_Desc: In the laning phase, use Vale's 2nd Skill to knock the opponent airborne, then follow up with his 1st Skill for damage.
Teamfight_Combo_Desc: In teamfights, use Vale's 2nd Skill to knock a line of enemies airborne, then follow up with his Ultimate and 1st Skill for a devastating combo.

Laning_Combo_Desc: In the laning phase, Claude can use his 1st Skill to poke the enemy, and use his 2nd Skill to close in on them when their HP is low, then use his Ultimate to kill them.
Teamfight_Combo_Desc: In teamfights, Claude should use his 1st Skill to stack up his buff first, and look for the best opportunities to get close to enemies with his 2nd Skill, and then use his Ultimate to finish them off.

Laning_Combo_Desc:
In the laning phase, Use Aldous' 1st Skill to enhance his next Basic Attack,
then his 2nd Skill to close in on the enemy to hit them with his enhanced attack. Follow with another 1st Skill to hit the enemy with another enhanced Basic Attack.
Teamfight_Combo_Desc: In teamfights, Use Aldous' Ultimate to gain vision on the enemy team, then use his Ultimate again to dash to the most vulnerable target. After the dash, use Aldous' 1st and 2nd skill combo to hit the enemy with his enhanced Basic Attacks.

Laning_Combo_Desc: Elven Form Selena can use her 2nd Skill to stun the enemy, then use her 1st Skill to poke enemies and deal damage.
Teamfight_Combo_Desc: Stay in Elven Form to cast her 1st and 2nd skill combo to catch the enemy hero in distance. Then cast her Ultimate to enter her Abyssal Form. Follow with her 2nd and 1st skill combo to close in and finish off the target, then cast her 2nd Skill to dash away.

Laning_Combo_Desc: In the laning phase, use Kaja's enhanced Basic Attacks and 1st Skill to wear down the enemy while stacking paralyze. Look for a chance to grab the enemy with Kaja's Ultimate then use his 2nd Skill to pull them out of position and into the bombs left by the 2nd Skill.
Teamfight_Combo_Desc: In teamfights, look for opportunities to use Kaja's Ultimate to suppress an important target, then use his 2nd Skill to pull them into his team and finish them off with his 1st Skill.

Laning_Combo_Desc: In the laning phase, get the buff from Chang'e's 2nd Skill first, then mark the enemy with her Basic Attacks. Cast her 1st Skill to slow down low HP enemy, and finish them off with her Ultimate.
Teamfight_Combo_Desc: In teamfights, get the shield from Chang'e's 2nd Skill, then use her 1st Skill to poke enemies, and follow up with her Ultimate if the 1st Skill was on target. Chang'e needs to move around during her Ultimate to keep herself safe and make sure the meteors can hit the target.

Laning_Combo_Desc: In the laning phase, use Hanabi's 2nd Skill to poke the enemy and mark them, and continue to chip away their HP with Basic Attack bounces before using her 1st Skill and engaging them head-on.
Teamfight_Combo_Desc: In teamfights, start with Hanabi's 2nd Skill to slow the enemies, then follow up with her Ultimate to immobilize them and let loose with Basic Attacks. During this time, use her 1st Skill accordingly for more damage and survivability, and keep up the damage with her bouncing Basic Attacks.

Laning_Combo_Desc: Uranus can use his 1st Skill to poke the enemy, then use the 2nd Skill - 1st Skill combo when their HP is low to finish them off.
Teamfight_Combo_Desc: Uranus should use his 2nd Skill to enter the fight, then his Ultimate to survive under enemy attacks while spamming his 1st Skill for sustained damage.

Laning_Combo_Desc: In the laning phase, initiate with Martis' 1st Skill to gather enemies and slow them, then follow up with his 2nd Skill. Use his 2nd Skill again to stay on the enemy and knock them airborne, and continue attacking with Basic Attacks.
Teamfight_Combo_Desc: In teamfights, engage using Martis' 1st Skill to gather enemies and slow them, then use his 2nd Skill to deal damage and knock them airborne, and continue with Basic Attacks. Finish enemies at low HP with his Ultimate, then chain more kills with the Ultimate.

Laning_Combo_Desc:
In the laning phase, harass enemies with Valir's 1st Skill
until their HP is low, then cast his 2nd Skill to push them back and follow up immediately with his 1st Skill for burst damage.
Teamfight_Combo_Desc: In teamfights, activate Valir's Ultimate to enhance his skills, then blast the enemy with his 1st Skill. If the enemy tries to get close, use his 2nd Skill to push them away, and hit them with his 1st Skill for high damage.

Laning_Combo_Desc: In the laning phase, Gusion can use his 1st Skill to mark the enemies, then use his 2nd Skill to slow them down. Next, he can use his 1st Skill again to move behind a target enemy and use his 2nd Skill again to deal massive damage. And finally, use his Basic Attacks to finish off the target.
Teamfight_Combo_Desc: In teamfights, Gusion should first use his 2nd Skill for damage, then his Ultimate to reset the cooldown for his 2nd Skill. Follow up with his 2nd and 1st Skill combo for more damage. And use his 2nd Skill again to recall all 10 daggers right after moving behind a target with his 1st Skill for massive damage. He can then finish off any remaining low-HP heroes and escape with his Ultimate.

Laning_Combo_Desc: In the laning phase, use Angela's 1st Skill to constantly poke the enemy. When their HP is low, use her 2nd Skill to CC the target, then continue to deal damage with her 1st Skill.
Teamfight_Combo_Desc: In teamfights, use Angela's Ultimate first to attach to a strong ally, and use her 1st Skill to deal damage or heal allies when needed. When enemies try to close in, CC them with her 2nd Skill, and follow up with her 1st Skill for sustained damage.

Laning_Combo_Desc: In the laning phase, use Jawhead's 2nd Skill to get close to the enemy, then follow up with his 1st Skill and Basic Attacks to deal continuous damage. When the enemy tries to run, use his 2nd Skill again to toss them back.
Teamfight_Combo_Desc: In teamfights, use Jawhead's 2nd Skill for the Movement Speed and start up his 1st Skill then immediately charge into a target using his Ultimate. Finally, use his 2nd Skill to toss the enemy back.

Laning_Combo_Desc: In the laning phase, once Lesley reaches full energy, and her enhanced Basic Attack is activated, wait for the opportunity to use the enhanced Basic Attack to hit the enemy hero. Then use her 1st Skill to reactivate the enhanced Basic Attack and hit the enemy again, and finally, use her Ultimate to finish off the enemy.
Teamfight_Combo_Desc: In teamfights, Lesley can repeatedly use her 1st Skill to deal more damage with her enhanced Basic Attack while moving. When the enemy hero is close, Lesley can use her 2nd Skill and the enhanced Basic Attack for the counterattack, and use his Ultimate to start reaping.

Laning_Combo_Desc: Pharsa should start with her 1st Skill to mark the enemy, follow up with her 2nd Skill to apply CC, and then cast her Ultimate to deal an insane amount of Magic Damage.
Teamfight_Combo_Desc: Pharsa can use her 4th Skill to get into an advantageous position to initiate a teamfight, followed by a damage combo with her 1st and 3rd skills and use her 2nd Skill when she wants to deal extra damage.

Laning_Combo_Desc: In the laning phase, blink to the target using Helcurt's 1st Skill, then stack up stingers with his Basic Attacks and finish the combo with his 2nd Skill.
Teamfight_Combo_Desc: In teamfights, cast Helcurt's Ultimate to obscure the enemies' vision, then blink to their backline with his 1st Skill to hit with his Basic Attacks, and end with his 2nd Skill.

Laning_Combo_Desc: In the laning phase, Zhask should start with his 1st Skill to summon a Nightmaric Spawn next to the enemy and follow up with his 2nd Skill to stun the target, then use his 3rd Skill for more damage.
Teamfight_Combo_Desc: In teamfights, Zhask should start by summoning his Nightmaric Spawn in a suitable location and use his Ultimate to fuse with it, then unleash his enhanced 2nd and 3rd Skill to stun and damage enemies, and follow up with Basic Attacks. If the enemy tries to flee, use his enhanced 1st Skill to blink toward them.

Laning_Combo_Desc: In the laning phase, Hylos should use his 1st Skill to get close and stun the enemy, then follow up with his 2nd Skill and Basic Attacks to deal damage.
Teamfight_Combo_Desc:
In teamfights, use Hylos' Ultimate to create a pathway into the enemy team
and then his 1st Skill to get in and stun an enemy. At the same time, use his 2nd Skill and Basic Attacks to deal continuous damage.

Laning_Combo_Desc: In the laning phase, use Diggie's 2nd Skill to confine the enemy to their location, then toss an owl alarm at them with his 1st Skill.
Teamfight_Combo_Desc: In teamfights, use Diggie's 1st Skill to poke the enemy. If an enemy tries to initiate, pull them back with his 2nd Skill. If a teammate gets CC'd or takes too much damage, use Diggie's Ultimate to save them.

Laning_Combo_Desc: In the laning phase, clear Minions by repeatedly using Lancelot's 1st Skill thanks to the cooldown reset, and stack his Passive before approaching the enemy and hitting them with his 2nd Skill.
Teamfight_Combo_Desc: In teamfights, use Lancelot's 1st Skill on frontline enemies to springboard into their backline, then unleash his 2nd Skill on the backline for heavy damage. Follow up with his Ultimate to charge through the target and block their escape, and use his 1st Skill to continue to chase or retreat.

Laning_Combo_Desc: In the laning phase, use Odette's 1st Skill to harass the opponent, and immobilize them with her 2nd Skill at the right moment before securing the kill with her Ultimate.
Teamfight_Combo_Desc:
In teamfights, initiate with Odette's 2nd Skill to immobilize the enemy
and activate her Ultimate to continuously damage the controlled targets.
Activate the dash from her Ultimate to reposition when enemies are about to escape, and finish them off with her 1st Skill after her Ultimate ends.

Laning_Combo_Desc: In the laning phase, use Argus's 1st Skill to close in on the opponent and slow them with his 2nd Skill while hitting with Basic Attacks. If the enemy tries to run, use the second cast of his 1st Skill to chase.
Teamfight_Combo_Desc: In teamfights, use Argus's 1st Skill to pull himself towards the enemy formation, then use the skill again to dash into their backline. Next, slow the enemy with his 2nd Skill and use Basic Attacks until his HP is low, then pop his Ultimate and continue the assault with Basic Attacks.

Laning_Combo_Desc: In small skirmishes,use Grock's 2nd Skill to knock the enemy toward him,then use his 1st Skill to slam them into the wall.Use his Ultimate to charge into the wall and knock them airborne again,and finish the job with Basic Attacks.
Teamfight_Combo_Desc: In teamfights,initiate with Grock's 2nd Skill to trap the enemies,then charge into the wall with his Ultimate.While the enemies are airborne, find a good angle to slam them into the wall with his 1st Skill and send them airborne again,then finish up with Basic Attacks.

Laning_Combo_Desc: In the laning phase, Irithel should maintain distance from the enemy and use her 1st Skill to reduce their Defense. Kite the enemy with Basic Attacks to chip away their HP. If the enemy tries to close in, use her 2nd Skill to maintain distance and continue firing Basic Attacks. When the time is right, use her Ultimate to enhance her Basic Attacks and finish off the enemy.
Teamfight_Combo_Desc: In teamfights, use Irithel's Ultimate at the start to enhance her Basic Attacks, then use her 1st Skill to reduce the enemies' Defense and use her Basic Attacks to hit multiple enemies. Use her 2nd Skill to slow enemies and prevent them from getting close.

Laning_Combo_Desc: In the laning phase, first use Harley's 2nd Skill to get a good angle to cast his 1st Skill, and follow up with Basic Attacks. Then use his 2nd Skill again to get back to safety.
Teamfight_Combo_Desc: In teamfights, use Harley's 2nd Skill to find a good position to land his Ultimate. Then cast his Ultimate at the target, and follow up with his 1st Skill before moving back to safety with his 2nd Skill.

Laning_Combo_Desc: In the laning phase, use Gatotkaca's 2nd Skill to CC the enemy by charging up to extend the range while aiming, then follow up with his 1st Skill and Basic Attacks.
Teamfight_Combo_Desc: In teamfights, use Gatotkaca's Ultimate to dive into the enemy team, then use his 2nd Skill to taunt them, and slow them with his 1st Skill before finishing with Basic Attacks.

Laning_Combo_Desc:
Use her 1st Skill to poke enemies and slow them, 

then follow up with Basic Attacks.

She can then use her 2nd Skill to chase or reposition herself.
Teamfight_Combo_Desc:
Use her Ultimate to apply extra Lightwheel Marks 
with Basic Attacks and 1st Skill to slow enemies, 
and then chase with her 2nd Skill to secure the kill.

Laning_Combo_Desc: In the laning phase, Roger should poke the enemy while in his Human form. Use his 2nd Skill for extra Movement Speed for an angle to hit with his 1st Skill. Use his Ultimate to close in on the enemy, followed by his 2nd Skill for Attack Speed and tear into them with Basic Attacks before finishing them off with his 1st Skill.
Teamfight_Combo_Desc: In teamfights, use Roger's 1st Skill to whittle down enemies from afar while using his 2nd Skill to maintain good positioning. When both sides have engaged, use his Ultimate to go for the enemy's back line. Use his 2nd Skill for extra Attack Speed and his 1st Skill to secure the kill.

Laning_Combo_Desc: Terrify enemy with 1st Skill and follow up with 2nd Skill for guaranteed damage.
Teamfight_Combo_Desc:
Initiate teamfights with CC or follow up after other CC. 
Use her Ultimate when enemies are gathered, follow up 
with 2nd and 1st Skill combo for CC and damage.

Laning_Combo_Desc: In the laning phase, use Lapu-Lapu's 1st Skill to poke enemies. When Bravery Blessing is full, use his 2nd Skill and enhanced Basic Attacks.
Teamfight_Combo_Desc:
In teamfights, use Lapu-Lapu's 1st Skill to wear down the enemies' HP, then follow up with his 2nd Skill to get close and use his Ultimate to initiate. While in Great Sword stance, use his Ultimate again for high burst damage, then use his 2nd Skill to gain Damage Reduction,
and finally CC the enemy with his 1st Skill.

Laning_Combo_Desc: In the laning phase, use Aurora's 2nd Skill to freeze the enemy, then follow up with her 1st Skill to ensure all the hits connect.
Teamfight_Combo_Desc: In teamfights, first cast Aurora's Ultimate when the enemy is grouped, then use her 2nd Skill immediately to freeze them inside the Ultimate's AOE, and finish with her 1st Skill on the CC'ed targets for maximum damage.

Laning_Combo_Desc: In the laning phase, Hilda can use her 1st Skill to close in on a target enemy, and slow them with her Enhanced Basic Attack. She can then follow up with her 2nd Skill to chip away at her target and finish with her Ultimate.
Teamfight_Combo_Desc: In teamfights, Hilda should use her Ultimate to dive the back-row heroes, then use her 2nd Skill to deal damage and chase the enemy down with her 1st Skill.

Laning_Combo_Desc: Estes can use his 2nd Skill to slow down and poke enemies, and heal allies with his 1st Skill.
Teamfight_Combo_Desc: Estes should use his 2nd Skill to slow down the enemy team, then heal his teammates with his Ultimate and 1st Skill.

Laning_Combo_Desc: Cyclops can use his 2nd Skill to close in on enemy heroes then hit them with both his 1st Skill and the spheres summoned by his 2nd Skill. This combo is very effective against enemy heroes.
Teamfight_Combo_Desc: In teamfights, Cyclops should control the target enemy with his Ultimate, close in with his 2nd Skill, then finish off the target with his 1st Skill.

Laning_Combo_Desc: In the laning phase, use Johnson's 1st Skill to stun enemies, then move in and hit them with his 2nd Skill and Basic Attacks.
Teamfight_Combo_Desc: In teamfights, cast Johnson's Ultimate and pick up a teammate before engaging the enemy. Then follow up with his 2nd Skill and 1st Skill to CC the enemy again.

Laning_Combo_Desc: In the laning phase, use Moskov's 1st Skill to blink to a position to stun the target with his 2nd Skill, then get in as many Basic Attacks as possible to reduce the cooldown of his skills.
Teamfight_Combo_Desc: In teamfights, use Moskov's Ultimate to slow a target, then activate it again to blink behind them and use his 2nd Skill to knock them into a stun before finishing them off with Basic Attacks.

Laning_Combo_Desc: In the laning phase, Yi Sun-shin should use his enhanced Basic Attacks from a distance, then close in with his 1st Skill and slash the enemy with two enhanced Basic Attacks. Follow up with a slash from his 2nd Skill and finish with 2 more enhanced Basic Attacks.
Teamfight_Combo_Desc: In teamfights, start with Yi Sun-shin's Ultimate, then use his enhanced 1st Skill to send his Turtle Ship into the enemy to stun them. Follow up with ranged Basic Attacks, then use his 1st Skill to get close and perform 2 enhanced Basic Attacks. Tap his 2nd Skill to perform another slash, and secure the kill with 2 more enhanced Basic Attacks.

Laning_Combo_Desc: In the laning phase, Use Ruby's 1st Skill to slow down the enemy, and the dash from her Passive to get closer. Then cast Ruby's Ultimate to pull the enemy into melee range and her 2nd Skill to keep them stunned. Finally, spam her Basic Attacks to finish them off.
Teamfight_Combo_Desc: In teamfights, use Ruby's 1st Skill to slow the enemy at a distance, and close in with her Passive dash. Then use her 2nd Skill to stun the enemies in range and use her Ultimate to pull back those who try to escape.

Laning_Combo_Desc: In the laning phase, slow the enemy with Alpha's 1st Skill, then hit them with his 2nd Skill to have Beta to lock on to them. Finish with Basic Attacks while Beta fires at the locked-on target.
Teamfight_Combo_Desc: In teamfights, use Alpha's Ultimate to charge toward enemy's key target, and use his 2nd Skill, follow up with his 1st Skill to slow them and continuously dish out damage to the locked-on targets with Basic Attacks.

Laning_Combo_Desc: Use Sun's 1st Skill to chip away at enemies, and close the distance once they're low on HP with his 2nd Skill. Then use his 3rd Skill to deal a burst of damage with his Dopplegangers. Sun can start with his Ultimate to summon a Doppleganger, then Blink on the enemy with his 2nd Skill, and finally use his 3rd Skill and Basic Attacks finish them off.
Teamfight_Combo_Desc: In teamfights, Sun can start with his Ultimate to summon a Doppelganger, and approach the enemy with his 2nd Skill. Finally, he can use his 2nd Skill and Basic Attacks to deal damage.

Laning_Combo_Desc: In the laning phase, use Chou's 2nd Skill to get close to the enemy and follow up with his 1st Skill for multiple strikes. After landing the 3rd strike of his 1st Skill, use the refreshed 2nd Skill to stay on the target and finish them with his Ultimate.
Teamfight_Combo_Desc: In teamfights, use Chou's 2nd and 1st Skill to get next to a key target, then use his Ultimate to knock them out of position and secure the kill with his team.

Laning_Combo_Desc: Kagura can use her 1st Skill to poke the enemy with her Umbrella, then her 2nd Skill to teleport to the Umbrella's location, dealing more damage to the enemies and dash back by casting her 2nd Skill again.
Teamfight_Combo_Desc: Kagura should place her Umbrella between the enemies with her 1st Skill, then use her Ultimate to reset the cooldown for her 1st Skill to be able to adjust the Umbrella location before teleporting to the Umbrella location to stun nearby enemies. She should then use her Ultimate + 2nd Skill combo to escape from the fighting zone.

Laning_Combo_Desc: When ganking, hide in a bush to activate Natalia's Passive, then approach the enemy from behind and blink to them with the enhanced Basic Attack. Follow up with her 2nd Skill to slow the enemy and chase after them using her 1st Skill.
Teamfight_Combo_Desc: In teamfights, use Natalia's Passive and enhanced Basic Attacks to approach enemies, then use her 2nd Skill to improve her survivability. Follow up with her 1st Skill then Ultimate and end with a Basic Attack to finish off the enemy.

Laning_Combo_Desc: Gord should look to stun the enemy heroes with his 1st Skill, then follow up with his 2nd Skill and Ultimate to get a quick kill on them.
Teamfight_Combo_Desc: Gord should look to stun the enemy heroes with his 1st Skill, then follow up with his 2nd Skill and Ultimate to get a quick kill on them.

Laning_Combo_Desc: Use Freya's 1st Skill to close the gap on enemies and knock them Airborne while giving herself a shield. Use her 2nd Skill once followed by 2 enhanced Basic Attacks to make use of the Attack Speed bonus and generate more Sacred Orbs from her Passive.
Teamfight_Combo_Desc: Use Freya's Ultimate to dive the enemy backline and start dealing Splash Damage. Use her 1st Skill to CC enemies and shield herself, then alternate between her 2nd Skill and AoE Basic Attacks to bring them down.

Laning_Combo_Desc: In the laning phase, use Hayabusa's 2nd Skill to hit the enemy with a phantom, then strike with his 1st Skill, and use his 2nd Skill to blink away. Wait until Hayabusa's 1st Skill is off cooldown, then blink back to the enemy with his 2nd Skill and strike again with his 1st Skill followed by his Ultimate to secure the kill.
Teamfight_Combo_Desc: In teamfights, Hayabusa should use his 2nd Skill to hit an enemy with his phantom, then use his 1st and 2nd Skill on the target to apply Shadow Mark before unleashing his Ultimate. Afterwards, use his 1st Skill to finish off the enemy and escape with his 2nd Skill.

Laning_Combo_Desc: In the laning phase, use Lolita's 1st Skill and enhanced Basic Attack to stun the enemy, then use her 2nd Skill to reflect ranged attacks.
Teamfight_Combo_Desc: In teamfights, use Lolita's 2nd Skill to reflect ranged attacks, followed by her 1st Skill to charge into enemies' midst, then use her enhanced Basic Attack to stun the target and deal damage. Follow up with her Ultimate for more damage and CC, and finish off the enemy with your team.

Laning_Combo_Desc: In the laning phase, use Minotaur's 1st Skill to knock the enemy airborne and reduce their Defense, then deal damage with his enhanced Basic Attacks. Use his 2nd Skill to heal him and his teammate to come out ahead in the trade.
Teamfight_Combo_Desc: In teamfights, use Minotaur's 1st Skill to jump in and knock enemies airborne, then use his Ultimate to keep them CC'd and enter Enraged state. Use his 1st Skill to knock enemies airborne again and continue with Basic Attacks. Use his 2nd Skill when he or his team needs healing.

Laning_Combo_Desc: In the laning phase, first use Layla's 2nd Skill to apply Magic Mark on the enemy, then detonate it with her 1st Skill for AOE damage while getting extra range for Basic Attacks to further harass the enemy from afar.
Teamfight_Combo_Desc: In teamfights, first use Layla's 1st Skill to increase the range of her 2nd Skill. With the extra range, she can easily apply marks to enemies. Use her Ultimate to detonate them all for a hefty bit of damage, and finish off with Basic Attacks.

Laning_Combo_Desc: In the laning phase, use Fanny's 2nd Skill at walls to quickly maneuver around and use her 1st Skill when near the enemy. Keep using her 2nd Skill to pass through the enemy to automatically trigger her 1st Skill, and use her Ultimate to secure kills.
Teamfight_Combo_Desc: In teamfights, use Fanny's 2nd Skill repeatedly to move around and use her 1st Skill when in the middle of the enemy. Look for low HP enemies to finish off with her Ultimate.

Laning_Combo_Desc: In the laning phase, Zilong should use his 2nd Skill to close in on the target enemy and lower their Defenses, then lift the target over his back with his 1st Skill, and spam Basic Attacks to trigger more Passive effects.
Teamfight_Combo_Desc: In teamfights, activate Zilong's Ultimate to gain Movement and Attack Speed bonus before charging at the target enemy with his 2nd Skill. Cast his 1st Skill after closing in on the enemy and follow up with Basic Attacks to trigger the Passive effects.

Laning_Combo_Desc: Eudora can poke enemies using her S2+S1 combo.
Teamfight_Combo_Desc: Eudora can control the enemy with her 2nd Skill, then follow up with her Ultimate+1st Skill combo to burst them down.

Laning_Combo_Desc: Use 1st Skill to poke enemiesand 2nd to heal and create distance.
Teamfight_Combo_Desc: Use 1st Skill to slow enemies,then her Ultimate for Control Effect,then use the 2nd Skill to restore allies' HP.

Laning_Combo_Desc: In the laning phase, Clint should use his 1st Skill followed by an enhanced Basic Attack, then his 2nd Skill followed by another enhanced Basic Attack. This combo maximizes his damage, immobilizes the target, and moves Clint out of harm's way.
Teamfight_Combo_Desc: In teamfights, use Clint's Ultimate and enhanced Basic Attacks to whittle down enemies from a distance. Once the enemy is weakened from the constant bombardment, use Clint's 1st Skill, Basic Attack, 2nd Skill, and Basic Attack combo to finish them off.

Laning_Combo_Desc: In the laning phase, use Bruno's 1st Skill to get a Powerball, and start attacking the enemy while picking up the ball. When the target is low, stun them with his 2nd Skill and finish them off with Basic Attacks.
Teamfight_Combo_Desc: In teamfights, start with Bruno's 1st Skill to get a Powerball and try to get in as much damage as possible. Look for enemies that are close together to use his Ultimate on, then use his Basic Attacks and 2nd Skill to secure the kill or retreat from danger.

Laning_Combo_Desc: In the laning phase, use Bane's 2nd Skill to get close to the enemy and hit them with an enhanced Basic Attack. Then use his 1st Skill to slow the enemy followed by another enhanced Basic Attack. And end with his 2nd Skill again with another enhanced Basic Attack.
Teamfight_Combo_Desc: In teamfights, use Bane's 2nd Skill to close in and catch multiple enemies with his Ultimate. Use an enhanced Basic Attack when the enemies are knocked airborne, then use his 2nd Skill and another enhanced Basic Attack. Finally, use his 1st Skill and enhanced Basic Attack to chase and finish off the enemy.

Laning_Combo_Desc: Use 1st Skill to hook the enemy into a bad position. Follow up with 2nd Skill to slow, then Ultimate to suppress and secure a kill.
Teamfight_Combo_Desc: Use Flicker to reach key targets for his Ultimate. Follow up with 1st Skill to extend the CC, then 2nd Skill to deal damage and slow.

Laning_Combo_Desc: In the laning phase, Akai should use his 1st Skill to knock back the enemy, and slow them down with his 2nd Skill, then spam his Basic Attack to deal damage.
Teamfight_Combo_Desc: In teamfights, Akai should use his 1st Skill to knock back the enemy, and roll into the enemy formation. Then use his Ultimate to disrupt the enemy formation, and continue to deal damage with his 2nd Skill after his Ultimate ends.

Laning_Combo_Desc: In the laning phase, use Karina's 1st Skill first to enter the Dance of Blades state and pounce on the enemy using the dash from her enhanced Basic Attack. Follow up with her 2nd Skill and Basic Attacks to trigger her Passive.
Teamfight_Combo_Desc: In teamfights, close in on the enemy using Karina's 1st Skill and cut into their formation with her Ultimate. Use her 2nd Skill for a quick AOE followed by her Ultimate to dash back to her Shadowform. Finally, use her 1st Skill again and enhanced Basic Attacks to chase down enemies.

Laning_Combo_Desc: In the laning phase, Alucard can use his 1st Skill to deal damage and slow enemies first, and follow it with Basic Attacks for strikes. Then, he can use his 2nd Skill and follow it with Basic Attacks for more strikes.
Teamfight_Combo_Desc:
In teamfights, Alucard can cast his ULTIMATE to increase Lifesteal and mark enemies and then switch between 1st Skill and 2nd Skill
to follow Basic Attacks. Finally, use his ULTIMATE again
for reaping kills.

Laning_Combo_Desc: In the laning phase, Tigreal can use his 2nd Skill to charge the enemy target and knock them airborne by casting it again. He then finishes with his 1st Skill to deal damage.
Teamfight_Combo_Desc: In teamfights, Tigreal should cast his 2nd Skill to charge in and then pull the enemy team towards him with his Ultimate. At the end of his CC, cast his 2nd Skill again to extend it, then use his 1st Skill to deal damage.

Laning_Combo_Desc: In the laning phase, Nana can use her 2nd Skill to harass enemy heroes and her 1st Skill to damage both enemy Minions and heroes, allowing her to poke enemies while farming.
Teamfight_Combo_Desc: In teamfights, Nana can use her 2nd Skill to slow the enemy first so she can hit and stun them with her Ultimate. She can then use her 1st Skill to finish off the low HP enemy.

Laning_Combo_Desc: Use Alice's 1st Skill to poke the opponent and recast it to blink on top of them, then follow up with her 2nd Skill to CC the enemies and finish with her Ultimate to continue the attack.
Teamfight_Combo_Desc: Use Alice's 1st Skill to poke the opponent and recast it to blink on top of them, then follow up with her 2nd Skill to CC the enemies and finish with her Ultimate to continue the attack.

Laning_Combo_Desc: Saber can use his 1st Skill to poke and weaken the enemy, follow with his 2nd Skill to close in, then use his Ultimate to finish them off.
Teamfight_Combo_Desc: Saber can use his 1st Skill to poke and weaken the enemy, follow with his 2nd Skill to close in, then use his Ultimate to finish them off.

Laning_Combo_Desc: Balmond can close in on the enemy with Soul Lock, follow up with Cyclone Sweep for continuous damage, then cast his Ultimate to finish off low HP enemies.
Teamfight_Combo_Desc: Balmond can close in on the enemy with Soul Lock, follow up with Cyclone Sweep for continuous damage, then cast his Ultimate to finish off low HP enemies.

Laning_Combo_Desc: When laning, immobilize the opponent with Miya's 2nd Skill and use her 1st Skill to poke them and clear Minions at the same time.
Teamfight_Combo_Desc: In teamfights, use Miya's Ultimate first to conceal herself, then find an ideal position to attack the enemy and quickly stack her Passive. Utilize her 2nd Skill to immobilize the enemy and activate her 1st Skill to enhance her Basic Attacks to hit multiple targets at once.
